short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TETRAIN is a fun chrome extension game. It saves your game when you exit the popup window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TETRAIN is a fun chrome extension game to play when you are bored. It is highly customisable with lots of fun features and updates. Automatically saves your game when exiting popup, and does not require internet!

Featuring
- Automatically saves your game when you exit
- Custom Piece Textures
- Gamemodes
- Customisable Keys
- Customisable window sizes
- Lots of other settings!

Contact (Bugs & Support): email 1337hashedbrowns@gmail.com or leave a review

Made by TheSavageTeddy and Roxiun
